preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood, carefully measure out 3 g of arsenic powder. 
 2. Measure 1 g of cerium oxide (CeO2). 
 3. Weigh 6 g of ruthenium powder. 
 4. Measure 1 g of silicon powder. 
 5. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until homogeneous.
